attributes.action: Petition for Urgent action by the Local Authorities to implement a restriction of  HGV Lorries travelling through the residential areas to and from Fradley Park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to the extensive damage they are causing. And for the Police to exercise the powers available to them under the Road Traffic Act 1988 sect 19 &22 to help alleviate the increasing road side damage, annoyance and nuisance to residents.
